EmailTemplate.subject: How to transform legacy apps to drive change in a digital world
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Undergoing the application migration journey can be cumbersome and challenging, especially when you have a complex application portfolio that consists of both legacy and newer apps on outdated systems. You are hindered by managing and operating manual processes to address security concerns, regulatory change and policy compliance.
The tools, methodologies and skills must change for application leaders like yourself to drive change in your organisation and ensure success. Let us show you how.
Watch our Application Migration: How to Start, Scale and Succeed <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-5-application-migration-how-to-start-scale-and-succeed-webinar]]> webinar replay to learn how to start, scale and succeed. Hear how large organisations plan and execute their application transformation initiatives by using a set of proven techniques and approaches to get started quickly and scale continuously. Let us show you how partnering with Pivotal can help you navigate your journey while instilling confidence along the way.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out our transformation experts here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-1&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
Thank you, Vanessa
